item.description:
Please join meetup member LisaF for a small-group skill-share on how to make yogurt easily at home with equipment you probably already have (a crockpot and a cooler).  Using this method you can make rich, creamy yogurt for a fraction of the price of store-bought yogurt.

For this skill-share we will be using raw organic cow's milk ($8/gallon from Balfour Farm) to make a gallon of yogurt (at $2/quart, that's a good deal!).  We will also make "greek" yogurt and taste the yogurt plain and with other add-ins such as honey, maple syrup and fruit.  Samples to take home (bring a half-pint jar and lid).

Child/baby friendly environment.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Skill-Share: Crockpot Yogurt-Making
